channel.title: How do i add things into my server?
channel.description: i was wondering what to do to update or add things into my server. (so npcs can say things) and add new commands. i heard it was complicated so i just wanted to know how.

item.title: How do i add things into my server?
item.dc:creator: @Sonis Sonis
item.description:
@Sonis wrote:

You just have to know NPC-ID and x, y cordz. It’s actually quite easy once you add a couple NPCs…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add things into my server?
